thread.title: VISIT FLORIDA Launches 2nd Annual ‘Sunshine Contest’

author: Shreyoshi .
title: VISIT FLORIDA Launches 2nd Annual ‘Sunshine Contest’
text:
TRAVEL DESTINATION NEWS » VISIT FLORIDA Launches 2nd Annual ‘Sunshine Contest’ VISIT FLORIDA Launches 2nd Annual ‘Sunshine Contest’   
Owing to its enormous success last year, VISIT FLORIDA has announced the second annual ‘Sunshine Contest’ for Indian travel agents and tour operators. The tourism board is offering two winners a chance to be a part of the next VISIT FLORIDA FAM trip. Taking place from 1 July to 30 August 2015, each participant must complete the application in entirety to qualify for the grand prize. The VISIT FLORIDA India team will judge each entry based on completion of the required criteria. The final announcement of the winners will be made the first week of September. The criteria for entering the contest are as follows: · ‘Like’ the VISIT FLORIDA India Facebook page 
· Complete the VISIT FLORIDA Specialist program and the Orlando Training program within the contest period 
· Draft a creative 10 day Florida itinerary using power point (Maximum 5 slides), clearly list: 
o your name
